title: Will Moba Legends be dealt with?
body:
Moba Legends is this MOBA on mobile, and it's a complete copy of LoL. The commercials on YT show more than enough. From the videos I saw-

-An almost exact same base design
-Gnar copy
-Diana copy
-Lucian copy
-Wayyyy more hugs copies, these are just what I remember. I'm sure you've seen some commercials of how bs it is.

Can Riot infringe them? Aren't their champs copyrighted? I'd like to see some action taken against the patheticness of Moba Legends
